name: eoss-esync
short_description:
eSync is a utility library written by  EOSSOnline Limited to help Java developers build synchronization solutions between File Systems and CMIS content Repositories

eSync handles actions on Files/Directories and Documents/Folders for Create, Update, Delete and Rename. You can also Checkout documents to your File System, edit them then either Commit the changes back to the Repository or Cancel the Checkout.

If your looking for a higher level interface checkout the eoss-edrive project http://sourceforge.net/projects/eoss-edrive which wraps eSync adding the ability to manage multiple syschronisers and control them via a simple command server.
summary: Sync file systems to and from CMIS Repositories
